name: 🐾 Paws & Relax: Cat Therapy Day 🐾
location: Furry Haven Cat Café, 12 Whisker Lane, Singapore
description: Feeling stressed? Take a break and unwind with our adorable therapy cats! 🐱💆‍♀️
whatToExpect: Interactive talk on ‘The Science of Purring’
cta: Limited slots available! Register now to secure your spot.

name: 🎨 Paint with Cats: Creative Art Session 🖌️
description: Unleash your inner artist alongside adorable feline companions! 🖌️🐱
whatToExpect: Guided painting session with an experienced art instructor
Cats roaming around while you create your masterpiece
Special paw print stamping activity for cat-themed art
Complimentary drinks & snacks for a cozy creative experience
cta: Join us for a purr-fectly creative day! Sign up here.

name: 🐱 Cat Care 101: Learn to Foster & Rescue! 🏡
description: Always wanted to help stray cats but don’t know how? Join our hands-on workshop to learn the basics of cat rescue, fostering, and care! 🐱🏡
whatToExpect: How to safely rescue and handle stray cats
Essential foster care skills: feeding, medical aid & socialization
Learn from veterinarians and experienced fosterers
Meet adorable rescue kittens looking for homes!
cta: Make a difference today! Reserve your seat.
